name: Flushing Financial Corporation
description: Flushing Financial Corporation is a bank holding company headquartered in Flushing, New York, primarily engaged in providing a wide range of financial services through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Flushing Bank. Founded in 1929, the company has a rich history rooted in serving the diverse communities of New York City, particularly in Queens and Nassau County. Flushing Bank offers a comprehensive suite of banking products, including personal and business checking and savings accounts, commercial and residential mortgages, and various lending solutions. With a focus on customer service and community engagement, Flushing Financial emphasizes its commitment to meeting the needs of its customers through innovative financial solutions and personalized banking experiences. The company has expanded its footprint through strategic growth initiatives, including branch openings and enhanced digital banking capabilities, allowing it to compete effectively in the dynamic banking sector. Flushing Financial is dedicated to socially responsible banking and actively participates in community development programs, reflecting its mission to support local economic growth while ensuring financial stability for its clients.

seo.meta_title: Flushing Financial Corporation | Banking Services and Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Flushing Financial Corporation, providing comprehensive banking services and solutions in New York City. Learn about our commitment to community and customer service.

faq.question: What services does Flushing Bank provide?
faq.answer: Flushing Bank offers personal and business banking services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, and mortgages.

faq.question: Where is Flushing Financial Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: Flushing Financial Corporation is headquartered in Flushing, New York, USA.

faq.question: When was Flushing Financial Corporation founded?
faq.answer: Flushing Financial Corporation was founded in 1929.
